data.content: what is the population of india in 2017
The estimated population of India in 2017 was approximately 1.34 billion people.
The population of India increased by approximately 17.7 million people in 2018.
The population of India increased by approximately 17.5 million people in 2019.
The population of India increased by approximately 14.5 million people in 2020.
so recently rate of increase is decreased?
Yes, it appears that the rate of population increase in India has been decreasing in recent years. While the population is still growing, the annual increase has been gradually declining.
